column3:
“I have a high tolerance
But this shit has me ticklin my fucken cat till it pisses in my mouth.
Gets me so spaced out and happy and giggly and creative. Makes everything seem like a fucken movie. Everyones luke skywalker and your george lucas. It has me view the world from this director point of view. Just amazing weed”

“This one is a pretty nice Sativa, just blasted this in the bong and definitely feeling more relaxed than beforehand. I also know I'm mellowing a bit cause my muscle tension has decreased and my joints have started cracking and popping. For those with musculoskeletal issues try this one out. The high is uplifting and energizing mentally which is kinda cool to have yer brain wake up while yer bod gets more chill- proba...”
“Made me feel very happy and uplifted. No negative effects happen to me.”

“This reminded me alot of Bluedream but with more of a movie butter smell in the background and slightly frostier, the berry notes were less pronounced and the sativa high hit fast and stronger than the dream, it was a speedier version of Bluedream but still had decent body relaxation on the back end of the buzz(30 min in) Subsequent hits did not result in sleepiness but brought the buzz back to speedy, however the bo...”

“especificamente creativa y relajante de aroma a madera incienso su efecto mucha euforia con un baño sedante deuna indica  mas sativa sin duda en lo medicinal 100%  recomendable debo remarcar que no es para.personas amateurs algunos casos puede causar mucha paranoia no cabe mencionar que para expertos esta genetica es recreativa  buenosss hummosss”

“I really like this stains effects, and flavor. Its an uplifting strain for sure. flavor profile in smoke is berry with touch of clean earth. flavor in vape is dominantly berry. yield was disappointing though.”
“Strong hitting even for those with a higher tolerance. Effects are accurate as on this site. most other strains blur into one but this stands out like a sore thumb”
“Leaves you feeling great and ready to conquer your upcoming task. Really nice head high.”

“Mostly very strong effects focused in the head. Makes me forgetful and unfocused and a little bit anxious/paranoid, but it's pretty good for my pain. It's not the first strain I'd recommend. Mostly I feel this is a good strain just to get plain ruined on, but otherwise it's not my cup of tea.”
“Leaves you feeling great and ready to conquer your upcoming task. Really nice head high.”
“This got weird pretty quickly, this is the first strain that has got me on a sad mood. It got me extremely happy-sad and hungry XD”
“FANTASTIC strain. Exactly as described. Euphoric. I just want to get up and dance. Haven't stopped smoking yet. Dry mouth for sure”

“- Really lovely experience
- Talkative
- realigned my intuition
- happy and easy going feel
- made me feel hungry within 60% of the experience
-heightened my senses
- easy burn and smooth exhale
- good flavor
- overall will keep getting in the future...

Brand: good flower
Product: Hazel Berry hybrid 
Origin: California
Feel: leisure and relaxation
Total Cannabinoids: 201.0 mg/g
THC: 193.0 mg/g
CBD: 0.40 mg/g 
Other ...”
“a mellow, mood changing high. definitely felt an overall pleasant sensation, mind & body.”

“Mostly very strong effects focused in the head. Makes me forgetful and unfocused and a little bit anxious/paranoid, but it's pretty good for my pain. It's not the first strain I'd recommend. Mostly I feel this is a good strain just to get plain ruined on, but otherwise it's not my cup of tea.”
“This strain has a sweet berry scent and taste is great. Good for outdoor hiking even though the affect will ware out within 38 min and gives me cotton mouth. I give it a 3 1/2 ⭐.”
